visualStyle.medium: Digital watercolor simulation with translucent washes
visualStyle.brushstrokes: Visible, organic brushstrokes especially in hair, denim, and shadows
visualStyle.edgeTreatment: Soft, feathered edges with slight blooming effect (pigment settling at edges)
visualStyle.texture: Handmade, organic texture throughout with wet-on-wet techniques
visualStyle.luminosity: Luminous quality with white background showing through translucent layers

skin.description: Warm light brown/beige with rosy undertones

hairAndBeard.description: Deep charcoal grey to black with grey highlights

shirt.description: Bright white with soft grey/blue washes

jeans.description: Medium to light blue with uneven wash texture

character.pose: Full-body standing, centered, facing forward with slight tilt

clothing.shirt: Short-sleeve white shirt with soft grey and blue washes for fabric folds
clothing.jeans: Medium to light blue denim with varied wash intensity
clothing.belt: Rich reddish-brown leather with detailed buckle
clothing.shoes: Brown leather shoes with stitching details

artisticDetails.hair: Layered brushstrokes for volume and texture
artisticDetails.denim: Uneven pigment distribution suggesting worn texture
artisticDetails.skin: Smooth gradients with subtle rosy undertones
artisticDetails.edges: Clean but with watercolor feathering in most areas
artisticDetails.outlines: Soft, implied rather than hard continuous lines
